# Welcome

Welcome to a demo website that uses the [`quarto-pyodide`](https://github.com/coatless-quarto/pyodide) extension to generate interactive code cells with [Quarto](https://quarto.org) and [Pyodide](https://pyodide.org/en/stable/).

```{pyodide-python}
print("Hello there! Welcome to a quarto-pyodide powered website!")
```
